author: dkhaywood
msg: fixed problem with memory object store not correctly rehydrating objects into the adapter manager

author: rcmatthews
msg: throw exception when component installer fails to load class, otherwise you are never know why start up fails

author: dkhaywood
msg: ObjectStore interface broken out for TransactionManager vs Persistor; removed commit/abort/start from Transaction's API (now internal); sorted out an issue with AdapterManager causing a mismatch (code is now closer to how it used to be, I was being too aggresive); lots of other files changed but just to do with ensureThat* assertion API change.
